scripts.docker:reset: docker compose down -v && docker network prune -f && docker system prune -af && echo 'docker containters:' && docker ps -a
scripts.convex:dev:bot: docker compose up convex-backend convex-dashboard telegram-bot -d && cd apps/docker-convex && CONVEX_URL=http://localhost:3210 pnpm convex dev --once
scripts.docker:restart-web-convex: docker compose stop web-dashboard convex-backend convex-dashboard && docker compose up web-dashboard convex-backend convex-dashboard -d
scripts.docker:llm-rebuild: docker compose stop lightweight-llm && docker compose build lightweight-llm && docker compose up lightweight-llm -d
scripts.dev:convex: cd apps/docker-convex && pnpm self-hosted:setup && pnpm deploy-functions
scripts.build:mobile: cd apps/mobile && echo 'Mobile build not applicable for development'
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd apps/golang-telegram-bot && make install
scripts.clean:all: turbo run clean && cd apps/golang-telegram-bot && make clean
scripts.mobile:ios: cd apps/mobile && (pnpm start & sleep 5 && pnpm ios)
scripts.convex:deploy: cd apps/docker-convex && CONVEX_URL=http://localhost:3210 pnpm convex dev --once
scripts.docker:web-reset: docker compose stop web-dashboard && docker compose rm -f web-dashboard && docker compose up web-dashboard -d
scripts.docker:logs-all: pnpm docker:web-app-logs && pnpm docker:convex-backend-logs && pnpm docker:llm-transformer-logs && pnpm docker:llm-logs
